messages.content: Welcome to the Adaptive Quizzing System, Frodo!
Strategy: Adaptive: Questions will be selected based on your performance and learning needs.
Current Learning Objective: Understand the key entities and relationships in Thra´in & Thorin (Characters)
Let's begin!

Which of the following is connected to Plague of Gondor?

1. Eärendil
2. Meneltarma
3. Meneldil (Character)
4. John
John

feedback.message: Hmm, not quite so, my friend. Even the wisest cannot see all ends.
feedback.explanation: The correct choice was 'Meneldil (Character)', as the ancient texts reveal.
next_steps: Do not be disheartened. Even Aragorn son of Arathorn had much to learn before claiming his throne.
Perhaps revisit the ancient scrolls that speak of these fundamental truths.

messages.content:

a region

feedback.message: Indeed! Your wisdom serves you well on this matter.
feedback.explanation: The ancient scrolls tell us:  Few know that Ettenmoors also played a role in the shaping of the Third Age, when the shadows first began to stir again.
next_steps: Your journey through Middle-earth's wisdom progresses well. Seek now the deeper mysteries that await.
